## IRegisterWithAs.instancePerContainer() method

Specifies instance per container scope resolution. Every resolution of a service returns the same instance per instance of a container Is similar to scope.container [scope](./typeioc.scope.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
instancePerContainer(): RegisterWithScope<T>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`RegisterWithScope<T>`

- an instance of [RegisterWithScope](./typeioc.registerwithscope.md) interface
